mapper.select: SELECT modelid as id ,modelname as `text`,icon,url,case parentid when '0' then '#' else parentid end as `parent` FROM sys_models where isused=0
SELECT roleid as id ,rolename as `text`,'fa fa-users' as icon,'' as url,'#' as `parent` FROM sys_roles

select modelid as id, modelname as `text` ,icon,url,case parentid when '0' then '#' else parentid end as `parent` from sys_models union all select funcid as id, funcname as `text` ,icon,url ,case modelid when '0' then '#' else modelid end as `parent` from sys_modelfuncs
